summary.span: 表示 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Represents a 32-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不可變的實值型別代表帶正負號的整數值的範圍從負 2,147,483,648 (代表常數) 到正數 2,147,483,647 (表示常數。 is an immutable value type that represents signed integers with values that range from negative 2,147,483,648 (which is represented by the constant) through positive 2,147,483,647 (which is represented by the constant. .NET Framework 也包含不帶正負號的 32 位元整數值類型， ，代表範圍從 0 到 4,294,967,295 的值。The .NET Framework also includes an unsigned 32-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from 0 to 4,294,967,295. ## 具現化的 Int32 值Instantiating an Int32 Value 您可以具現化值以數種方式：You can instantiate an value in several ways: - 您可以宣告變數並將其指派的範圍內的常值的整數值資料型別。You can declare an variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下列範例會宣告兩個變數並將它們指派這種方式的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#1)] - 您可以將其範圍是一小部分的整數類型的值指派的型別。You can assign the value of an integer type whose range is a subset of the type. 這是擴展轉換，不需要轉換運算子，在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的轉換方法。This is a widening conversion that does not require a cast operator in C# or a conversion method in Visual Basic. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#4)] - 您可以指派數字型別，其範圍超過值的型別。You can assign the value of a numeric type whose range exceeds that of the type. 這是縮小轉換，因此如果需要轉換運算子，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的轉換方法`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 如果數字的值是， ，或包含小數部分，而它的小數部分的處理的值取決於編譯器執行轉換。If the numeric value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 下列範例會將數個數值的縮小轉換變數。The following example performs narrowing conversions to assign several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#2)] - 您可以呼叫的方法類別，以轉換任何支援的型別值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to an value. 這可能是因為支援介面。This is possible because supports the interface. 下列範例說明轉換的一連串值來值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt32#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint32/cs/toint32_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt32#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint32/vb/toint32_1.vb#4)] - 您可以呼叫或是方法，將轉換的字串表示法值。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of an value to an . 字串可以包含十進位或十六進位的數字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下列範例說明使用十進位和十六進位字串的剖析作業。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#3)] ## Int32 值上執行的作業Performing Operations on Int32 Values 類型支援標準的數學運算，例如加法、 減法、 部門、 乘法、 負號、 和一元否定運算。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, negation, and unary negation. 像其他整數類資料類型，類型也支援位元`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左 shift 鍵和向右移位運算子。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 您可以使用標準數值運算子比較兩個值，或您可以呼叫或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 您也可以呼叫的成員類別來執行各種不同的數字的作業，包括取得數值的絕對值，計算商數和餘數整數除法運算，判斷兩個最大或最小值整數，取得數字符號和捨入數字。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## 表示為字串的 Int32Representing an Int32 as a String 型別提供完整支援標準和自訂數值格式字串。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) 若要格式化值為沒有前置零的整數類資料字串，您可以呼叫無參數方法。To format an value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 藉由使用"D"格式規範，您也可以包含指定之字串表示法中的前置零的數目。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 藉由使用"N"格式規範，您可以包含群組分隔符號，並指定才會出現在數字的字串表示的小數位數。By using the "N" format specifier, you can include group separators and specify the number of decimal digits to appear in the string representation of the number. 您可以藉由使用"X"格式規範，表示做為十六進位字串的值。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent an value as a hexadecimal string. 下列範例會格式化的陣列中的項目下列四種方式的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these four ways. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/cs/Formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/vb/Formatting1.vb#1)] 您也可以格式化值為二進位，八進位、 十進位或十六進位的字串，藉由呼叫方法並提供方法的第二個參數的基底。You can also format an value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下列範例會呼叫此方法，以顯示二進位、 八進位和十六進位表示的整數值的陣列。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of integer values. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/cs/Formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/vb/Formatting1.vb#2)] ## 使用非十進位 32 位元整數值Working with Non-Decimal 32-Bit Integer Values 除了使用個別的整數，做為十進位值，您可能想要執行位元運算的整數值，或使用整數值的二進位或十六進位表示。In addition to working with individual integers as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with integer values, or work with the binary or hexadecimal representations of integer values. 值會表示 31 位元，並做為正負號位元的三十秒位元。 values are represented in 31 bits, with the thirty-second bit used as a sign bit. 正值是利用標誌大小表示法來表示。Positive values are represented by using sign-and-magnitude representation. 負數的值為二補數表示法中。Negative values are in two's complement representation. 這很重要要牢記在心，當您在上執行位元運算值，或當您使用個別位元。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要執行的數字、 布林值或在任何兩個非十進位值的比較作業，這兩個值都必須使用相同的表示法。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation.

span.span: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.

threadsafe.span: 為與任何其他型別，讀取和寫入共用的變數，其中包含這個型別的執行個體必須受到鎖定，以確保執行緒安全性。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有將`value`物件的參數。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 根據您的程式語言，可能是程式碼可能方法的參數類型具有較少的位元的位置 （較窄） 與執行個體類型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 這可能是因為有些程式語言會執行隱含的擴展轉換，將參數表示為型別具有相同位元數與執行個體。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假設此執行個體類型是，且參數類型為。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 編譯器會產生代表做為參數的值的指示，然後產生比較的值的方法執行個體和參數表示法。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an , then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 請參閱您的程式語言的文件，以判斷其編譯器是否會執行隱含的擴展轉換數值類型上。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 除了顯示四個不同的比較結果的方法所傳回的值，它會將傳回值的自訂成員`Comparison`列舉型別，它也會顯示其值。In addition to displaying the value returned by the method for four different comparisons, it converts the return value to a member of the custom `Comparison` enumeration, whose value it also displays. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.CompareTo/cs/CompareTo1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.CompareTo/vb/CompareTo1.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks `style`參數定義的樣式項目 (例如空白字元、 正數或負號或千分位分隔符號) 中允許`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space, the positive or negative sign symbol, or the thousands separator symbol) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`s`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws][ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`包含:Or, if `style` includes : [ws] hexdigits [ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，也可以顯示在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義和目前文化特性的屬性。Its position in the string is defined by the and properties of the current culture. 目前的文化特性的貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign. 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，也可以顯示在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag. 可用於括號`s`表示負值`style`包含旗標。Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the flag.| |*digits**digits*

*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*

*exponential_digits**exponential_digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9. 針對*fractional_digits*，只有數字 0 是有效。For *fractional_digits*, only the digit 0 is valid.| |*、**,*|特定文化特性的千位分隔符號。A culture-specific thousands separator symbol. 目前的文化特性的千分位分隔符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The current culture's thousands separator can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 目前的文化特性的貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag. 只是數字 0 會顯示為小數位數的剖析作業才會成功;如果*fractional_digits*包含任何其他數字，就會擲回。Only the digit 0 can appear as a fractional digit for the parse operation to succeed; if *fractional_digits* includes any other digit, an is thrown.| |*e**e*|'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示代表的值時，會以指數標記法。The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一連串的從 0 到 f 或 0 到 f 的十六進位數字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何終止 NUL (u+0000) 字元`s`剖析作業中，不論值會忽略`style`引數。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 只有數字的字串 (對應至樣式) 一律會成功剖析。A string with digits only (which corresponds to the style) always parses successfully. 大部分的其餘成員控制可能，但不是一定要出現在輸入字串的項目。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in the input string. 下表指出如何個別成員會影響可能會出現在項目`s`。The following table indicates how individual members affect the elements that may be present in `s`. |NumberStyles ||*號*括號括住的數字值的形式的項目。The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.| ||千分位分隔符號 ( *，* ) 項目。The thousands separator ( *,* ) element.| ||\* $ \*項目。The *$* element.| ||全部。All. flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix. 例如，"C9AF3 「 剖析成功，但是"0xC9AF3 」 並不會。For example, "C9AF3" parses successfully, but "0xC9AF3" does not. 只有其他旗標，可以結合`s`參數，它會和。The only other (列舉會包含複合的數字樣式，其中包含這兩個空白字元旗標。)(The enumeration includes a composite number style, , that includes both white space flags.) `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中初始化目前系統文化特性的物件。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 若要指定的文化特性的格式資訊用於剖析作業，請呼叫多載。To specify the culture whose formatting information is used for the parse operation, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析的字串表示，數個值。The following example uses the method to parse the string representations of several values. 目前的文化特性的範例中是 EN-US。The current culture for the example is en-US. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法通常用來將各種不同的方式來格式化的文字轉換值。This overload of the method is typically used to convert text that can be formatted in a variety of ways to an value. 比方說，它可以用來轉換使用者 HTML 文字方塊中輸入數值的文字。For example, it can be used to convert the text entered by a user into an HTML text box to a numeric value. `s`參數會包含數字的格式：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][簽署] 數字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|範圍從 0 到 9 的數字順序。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`參數會解譯使用樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十進位數字，只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要明確地定義中可以存在的樣式項目`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use the method. `provider`參數是實作，例如或物件。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a or object. `provider`參數提供特定文化特性格式資訊`s`。The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information about the format of `s`. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例是按鈕 click 事件處理常式的 Web 表單。The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form. 它會使用所傳回的陣列屬性來判斷使用者的地區設定。It uses the array returned by the property to determine the user's locale. 它接著會執行個體化對應至該地區設定物件。It then instantiates a object that corresponds to that locale. 所屬的物件物件會傳遞至方法，將轉換使用者輸入的目標值。The object that belongs to that object is then passed to the method to convert the user's input to an value. remarks.format:
## Remarks `style`參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空格或正號）`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or the positive sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`s`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digist][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws][ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digist][e[sign]exponential_digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`包含:Or, if `style` includes : [ws] hexdigits [ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，也可以顯示在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義的屬性所傳回的物件方法`provider`參數。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign. 符號可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標或結尾處`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The sign can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag. 可用於括號`s`表示負值`style`包含旗標。Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the flag.| |*digits**digits*

*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*

*exponential_digits**exponential_digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9. 針對*fractional_digits*，只有數字 0 是有效。For *fractional_digits*, only the digit 0 is valid.| |*、**,*|特定文化特性的千位分隔符號。A culture-specific thousands separator symbol. 千分位分隔符號所指定的文化特性`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The thousands separator of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 指定的文化特性的小數點符號`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.

thrown.| |*e**e*|'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示代表的值時，會以指數標記法。The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一連串的從 0 到 f 或 0 到 f 的十六進位數字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何終止 NUL (u+0000) 字元`s`剖析作業中，不論值會忽略`style`引數。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 十進位數字的字串 (對應至樣式) 的範圍內時永遠會成功的剖析型別。A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the style) always parses successfully if it is in the range of the type. 大部分的其餘成員控制可能，但不是一定要出現在此輸入字串的項目。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string. 下表指出如何個別成員會影響可能會出現在項目`s`。The following table indicates how individual members affect the 如果`s`指數標記法中的數字表示，它必須表示為整數的範圍內資料型別，如果沒有非零的小數點後的元件。If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the data type without a non-zero, fractional ( *,* ) element.| ||\* $ \*項目。The *$* element.| 如果旗標用，`s`必須是不含前置詞的十六進位值。If the flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix. 例如，"C9AF3 「 剖析成功，但是"0xC9AF3 」 並不會。For example, "C9AF3" parses successfully, but "0xC9AF3" does not. 只有其他旗標可存在於`style`都和。The only other flags that can be present in `style` are and . (列舉型別有複合的數字樣式，其中包含這兩個空白字元旗標。)(The enumeration has a composite number style, , that includes both white space flags.) `provider`參數是實作，例如或物件。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a or object. `provider`參數提供用於剖析的特定文化特性資訊。The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會使用各種`style`並`provider`剖析的字串表示的參數值。The following example uses a variety of `style` and `provider` parameters to parse the string representations of values. 它也說明一些可以解譯相同的字串，根據文化特性的格式資訊用於剖析作業中的不同方式。It also illustrates some of the different ways the same string can be interpreted depending on the culture whose formatting information is used for the parsing operation. A物件，表示要使用之格式化規則所屬的文化特性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - A包含特定數字的格式資訊，此值的物件。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 自訂物件實作，且方法會傳回提供格式設定資訊的物件。A custom object that implements and whose method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`已`null`或無法取得物件，從`provider`，傳回值的格式使用執行緒目前的文化特性的物件。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 執行緒目前文化特性的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式中指定的格式，使用值物件，表示目前的文化特性的慣例。The method formats an value in a specified format by using a object that represents the conventions of the current culture. 如果您想要使用預設值 （"G"或一般） 格式或指定不同的文化特性，請使用的其他多載方法，如下所示：If you want to use the default ("G", or general) format or specify a different culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|文化特性For culture|使用多載Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |預設值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|預設值 （目前） 的文化特性Default (current) culture|| |預設值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定文化特性A specific culture|| |以特定格式A specific format|特定文化特性A specific culture|| `format`參數可以是任何有效的標準數值格式規範，除了"R"，以及自訂數值格式規範的任何組合。The `format` parameter can be any valid standard numeric format specifier except for "R", as well as any combination of custom numeric format specifiers. 如果`format`是`null`或空字串 ("")，這個執行個體傳回的值會格式化以一般的數值格式規範 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value of this instance is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). .NET Framework 會提供廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 這個執行個體傳回的值會以格式化目前文化特性。The return value of this instance is formatted with the for the current culture. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示值使用每個支援標準數值格式規範，以及兩個自訂數值格式字串。The following example displays an value using each of the supported standard numeric format specifiers, together with two custom numeric format strings. 在將數字的值轉換為字串，此範例會使用 EN-US 文化特性的格式化慣例。In converting the numeric values to strings, the example uses the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像是方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它就不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試萬一`s`無效，無法成功剖析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed. `s`參數會包含數字的格式：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][簽署] 數字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|範圍從 0 到 9 的數字順序。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`參數會解譯使用樣式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十進位數字，只允許前置和尾端空格，以及前置正負號。In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要明確定義的樣式項目，以及可出現在特定文化特性格式資訊`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`參數會剖析使用的格式設定資訊中初始化目前系統文化特性的物件。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current system culture. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個多載方法會解譯中的所有位數`s`參數做為十進位數字。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要剖析的十六進位數字的字串表示，呼叫多載。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫具有幾個不同字串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. [!code-cpp[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/cpp/int32.tryparse1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)] 部分的字串，方法是無法在此範例中，將會：Some of the strings that the method is unable to convert in this example are: - "9432.0"."9432.0". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含小數點;它必須包含整數數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only. - "16,667"."16,667". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含群組分隔符號;它必須包含整數數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only. - "(100)"."(100)". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含不同於目前的文化特性所定義的負號和屬性。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's and properties. - 「 01FA"。"01FA". 轉換會失敗，因為字串不能包含十六進位數字;它必須包含十進位數字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.

span.span: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its 32-bit signed integer equivalent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像是方法，除了方法不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它就不需要使用例外狀況處理來測試萬一`s`無效，無法成功剖析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be parsed successfully. `style`參數定義中允許的樣式項目 （例如空格或正的或負號）`s`剖析作業成功的參數。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space or a positive or negative sign) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. 它必須是從位元旗標的組合列舉型別。It must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. 值而定`style`，則`s`參數可能包括下列項目：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws][ws][$][sign][digits,]digits[.fractional_digits][e[sign]digits][ws] 或者，如果`style`參數包含:Or, if the `style` parameter includes : [ws] hexdigits [ws][ws]hexdigits[ws] 在方括號 （[和]） 是選用項目。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|選擇性的泛空白字元。Optional white space. 空白字元可以出現在開頭`s`如果`style`包含旗標，或在結尾`s`如果`style`包含旗標。White space can appear at the beginning of `s` if `style` includes the flag, or at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字串中的位置由定義的屬性所傳回的物件方法`provider`參數。Its position in the string is defined by the property of the object returned by the method of the `provider` parameter. 貨幣符號會出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*簽署**sign*|選擇性正負號。An optional sign. 符號可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含或旗標。A sign symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the or flags.| |*digits**digits*|從 0 到 9 的數字序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9.| |*、**,*|特定文化特性的千位分隔符號。A culture-specific thousands separator. 千分位分隔符號所指定的文化特性`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The thousands separator of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定文化特性的貨幣符號。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 指定的文化特性的小數點符號`provider`可以出現在`s`如果`style`包含旗標。The decimal point symbol of the culture specified by `provider` can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*|數字 0 的一或多個項目。One or more occurrences of the digit 0. 小數點後數字可以出現在`s`只有當`style`包含旗標。Fractional digits can appear in `s` only if `style` includes the flag.| |*e**e*|'E' 或者 'E' 字元，表示代表的值時，會以指數標記法。The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`參數可代表指數標記法之數字，如果`style`包含旗標。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一連串的從 0 到 f 或 0 到 f 的十六進位數字A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何終止 NUL (u+0000) 字元`s`剖析作業中，不論值會忽略`style`引數。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 十進位數字的字串 (對應至旗標) 一律會成功剖析。A string with decimal digits only (which corresponds to the flag) always parses successfully. 大部分的其餘成員控制可能，但不是一定要出現在此輸入字串的項目。Most of the remaining members control elements that may be but are not required to be present in this input string. 下表指出如何個別成員會影響可能會出現在項目`s`。The following table indicates how individual members affect the elements that may be present in `s`. |非複合的 NumberStyles 值Non-composite NumberStyles values|允許 s 除了數字中的項目Elements permitted in s in addition to digits| |----------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------| ||只有小數位數。Decimal digits only.| ||小數點 (*。*) 和*fractional_digits*項目。The decimal point (*.*) and *fractional_digits* elements. 不過， *fractional_digits*必須包含一個或多個 0 的數字或這個方法會傳回`false`。However, *fractional_digits* must consist of only one or more 0 digits or the method returns `false`.| ||`s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation. 如果`s`指數標記法中的數字表示，它必須表示為整數的範圍內資料型別，如果沒有非零的小數點後的元件。If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the data type without a non-zero, fractional component.| ||*Ws*開頭的項目`s`。The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.| ||*Ws*結尾的項目`s`。The *ws* element at the end of `s`.| ||之前不可以出現登*位數*。A sign can appear before *digits*.| ||之後可以出現的徵兆*位數*。A sign can appear after *digits*.| ||*號*括號括住的數字值的形式的項目。The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.| ||千分位分隔符號 (*，*) 項目。The thousands separator (*,*) element.| ||\* $ \*項目。The *$* element.| ||所有項目。All elements. `s`參數不能代表十六進位數字或指數標記法之數字。The `s` parameter cannot represent a hexadecimal number or a number in exponential notation.| ||*Ws*元素的開頭或結尾`s`，*登*開頭`s`，並在小數點 (*。*) 符號。The *ws* element at the beginning or end of `s`, *sign* at the beginning of `s`, and the decimal point (*.*) symbol. `s`參數也可以使用指數標記法。The `s` parameter can also use exponential notation.| ||*Ws*，*號*，千分位分隔符號 (*，*)，和小數點 (*。*) 項目。The *ws*, *sign*, thousands separator (*,*), and decimal point (*.*) elements.| 剖析成功，但是"0xC9AF3 」 並不會。For example, "C9AF3" parses successfully, but "0xC9AF3" does not. 只有其他旗標可存在於`style`都和。The only other flags that can be present in `style` are and . (列舉型別有複合樣式， ，其中包含這兩個空白字元旗標。)(The enumeration has a composite style, , that includes both white space flags.) `provider`參數是實作，例如物件或物件，其方法會傳回物件。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a object or a object, whose method returns a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`s`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `s`. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫具有不同的字串數目的方法和值。The following example calls the method with a number of different string and values.
